alert.note: Alert for Greene; Montgomery (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 2:58PM EST until February 27 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN GREENE AND SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 257 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Moraine, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Miamisburg, Springboro, Bellbrook, Moraine, Oakwood, Wright-Patterson Afb, West Carrollton, Riverside, Centerville, Woodbourne-Hyde Park and Overlook-Page Mano. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 42 and 56. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
